# This file is a part of gr-gnugym

########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/gnugym
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-gnugym)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
  copy_module_for_tests ALL
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
          ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/gnugym/
)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_gnugym_moving_average_vect_ff ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_gnugym_moving_average_vect_ff.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_gnugym_parse_seqnr ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_gnugym_parse_seqnr.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_gnugym_rssi_cb ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_gnugym_rssi_cb.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_gnugym_snr_cb ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_gnugym_snr_cb.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_gnugym_snrdebug_ff ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_gnugym_snrdebug_ff.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_calculateTxDuration ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_calculateTxDuration.py)
